nodes.text: Petano Dreth was a male Jedi of the Jedi Order. Supposedly, Dreth and Kjus Androth were enlisted by fellow Jedi Sol Mogra, who required assistance in finding a mysterious individual causing terror in the Coruscant Underworld. Unknown to Mogra and his associates, the individual was Mogra himself, having been afflicted by the amulet he wore, containing the dark emotions of both himself and his Jedi Master, Nil Idyth.
